meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>peculiar</kanji> <kanji>drug</kanji> that seems too good to be true? That's what we call a <vocabulary>wonder drug</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>miracle cure</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
